genresAdvancedInfo.name: theremin
genresAdvancedInfo.description: A unique and unusual music genre that is played using a theremin, an electronic instrument that produces sound by detecting the movement of the player's hands. Theremin music is known for its eerie, otherworldly sound, which is created by manipulating the pitch and volume of the instrument without actually touching it. This genre is often used in science fiction and horror movies to create a sense of suspense and tension.
